# Environment Scripts

Place shell or PowerShell helpers here:

- `setup-yocto-env.sh` to source the Microchip toolchain and export `MACHINE=mpfs-dev-kit`.
- `setup-zephyr-env.sh` to bootstrap west and Zephyr modules.
- `setup-libero-env.ps1` for Libero/HSS tooling on Windows.

Document prerequisites and expected environment variables inside each script.
